# VEHICLE::SET_CAN_RESPRAY_VEHICLE

## Summary
Set the vehicle can be resparyed

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** canChangeColourFlag

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Hardcoded to not work in multiplayer.
